scripts.build-move: react-scripts build && mv -f ./build/index.html ../flask_server/templates/index.html && mv -f ./build/static/js/ ../flask_server/static/js/ && mv -f ./build/static/css/ ../flask_server/static/css/ && mv -f ./build/static/media ../flask_server/static/media
scripts.build-move-windows: react-scripts build && rmdir /S /Q ..\flask_server\static && mkdir ..\flask_server\static && move /Y build\index.html ..\flask_server\templates\index.html && move /Y build\static\js ..\flask_server\static\ && move /Y build\static\css ..\flask_server\static\ && move /Y build\static\media ..\flask_server\static\
